channel.title: ~report Button~
channel.description:
i got bored and decided to make a new tool for RSPS its a report button that u place in client
all u do is open it up
click report and it well take you to your website atm when you click report it well take you to a website called hurtscape.tk
u can change that very fast.
Steps to change the website to your website address
open up the folder:you well also need .net & mircosoft basic to change the reporting website to your reporting website i made it so they cant see url or anything :P well onc you download .net and mircosoft basic visual you open up folder
You well see a button square shaped with blue and purple open it up (rember must need mircosoft basic to change url)
let it load wait around 2--5mins once its up You well see a big blue box then u well see how the program i made looks like right click on Report Button and go to View code: you well see this:
Public Class Form1
Private Sub Button2_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click WebBrowser1.Navigate("http://hurtscape.tk") End Sub End Class
Were it says "http://HurtScape.tk" Change that part into any website u want it to go to so if u have a website and a chatbox for reporting or anything tpye it in it should looks like this
Public Class Form1
Private Sub Button2_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click WebBrowser1.Navigate("http://ReportAbusebuttontesint.com/") End Sub End Class
well u can make the thing change into anything u want
i would recommend it for Report button
i well come up with a better program this program only took me like 10mins to make tbh lol soz i didnt put enough effort onto it :P
Report abuse Program link: http://www.mediafire.com/?vhi5pwd7x1aw72a mircosoft BasicVisual: http://www.microsoft.com/visualstudio/en-us/visual-studio-2010-launch?WT.srch=1&WT.srch=1
.net framework: http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?FamilyID=0856eacb-4362-4b0d-8edd-aab15c5e04f5&displaylang=en
Dont forget to rep
[code=applescript]also if u need a good coder for any type or RSPS or a program u want specialy made for your RSPS Post and i well make it. soory i didnt really work hard on this :/[/code]
If u need a coder/webmaker/Program maker or if u just want a special program post and i well make it ^^ lol i get bored :P
Feel free to donate to my paypal account if u want to see more the more Donations the more programs i well be releasing World Map button for all RSPS types witch includes
317/614/562/508/525/194/620/474 in about 20--50mins ^^ donate at:
Holmes.Dylan@ymail.com

item.title: ~report Button~
item.dc:creator: @black_birds0 black birds0
item.description:
@black_birds0 wrote:

i got bored and decided to make a new tool for RSPS its a report button that u place in client

all u do is open it up

click report and it well take you to your website
atm when you click report it well take you to a website called hurtscape.tk

u can change that very fast.

Steps to change the website to your website address

open up
the folder:you well also need .net & mircosoft basic to change the reporting website to your reporting website i made it so they cant see url or anything well onc you download .net and mircosoft basic visual you open up folder

You well see a button square shaped with blue and purple open it up (rember must need mircosoft basic to change url)

let it load wait around 2–5mins once its up
You well see a big blue box
then u well see how the program i made looks like right click on Report Button and go to View code:
you well see this:

Public Class Form1

Private Sub Button2_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click
    WebBrowser1.Navigate("http://hurtscape.tk")
End Sub

End Class

Were it says “http://HurtScape.tk” Change that part into any website u want it to go to
so if u have a website and a chatbox for reporting or anything
tpye it in it should looks like this

Public Class Form1

Private Sub Button2_Click(ByVal sender As System.Object, ByVal e As System.EventArgs) Handles Button1.Click
    WebBrowser1.Navigate("http://ReportAbusebuttontesint.com/")
End Sub

End Class

well u can make the thing change into anything u want

i would recommend it for Report button

i well come up with a better program this program only took me like 10mins to make tbh lol soz i didnt put enough effort onto it

Report abuse Program link:
http://www.mediafire.com/?vhi5pwd7x1aw72a
mircosoft BasicVisual:
http://www.microsoft.com/visualstudio/en-us/visual-studio-2010-launch?WT.srch=1&WT.srch=1

.net framework:
http://www.microsoft.com/downloads/en/details.aspx?FamilyID=0856eacb-4362-4b0d-8edd-aab15c5e04f5&displaylang=en

Dont forget to rep

also if u need a good coder for any type or RSPS or a program u want specialy made for your RSPS Post and i well make it. soory i didnt really work hard on this :/

If u need a coder/webmaker/Program maker
or if u just want a special program post and i well make it ^^ lol i get bored

Feel free to donate to my paypal account if u want to see more the more Donations the more programs i well be releasing World Map button for all RSPS types witch includes

317/614/562/508/525/194/620/474 in about 20–50mins ^^
donate at:
